title: Strategies for Enhancing Self-Efficacy in University Learning: Systematic Analysis and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Learning outcome measurement through project-based assessment and learning in constrained technology environments where smartphones are the primary medium

learning_goals: Learners can understand the theoretical foundations of self-efficacy and explain its impact on mathematics learning.
Learners can apply self-efficacy enhancement strategies in digital environments to practical cases.
Learners can implement plans for improving self-efficacy through feedback and experiential accumulation as project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
